description: Capture the moment as at happens with your DSLR camera and this 16GB high speed SDHC UHS-1 memory card. Designed for photo enthusiasts, this memory card is ideal for burst shooting and HD video modes of today's DSLR cameras and HD camcorders. You can capture approximately 160 high resolution photos in one minute using continuous shooting mode. Plus, File Rescue helps recover photos and videos that has been accidentally damaged or deleted. This memory card can also achieve rapid data rates when transferring content-even large, high-resolution HD files-back to your PC. And when used with non-UHS-1 supported hardware, this card will still maintain its Class 10 speed.
title: Sony16GB SDHC UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card, 2 Pack (SF16UXD/TQN)
